title: I HAVE FOUND A FRIEND IN JESUS

content.chorus:
In sorrow He's my comjor,
In trouble He's my stay
He tells me every care on Him to roll
He's the lily of the valley
The bright and morning star
He's the fairest of ten thousand 
to my soul
verses:
I have found a friend in Jesus,
He's everything to me
He's the fairest of ten thousand to my soul
The lily of the valley in Him alone I see
All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole

And all my grief He has taken
And all my sorrows borne
In temptation He's my strength and mighty pow
I have all for Him forsaken, I've all my idols torn
From my heart and now he keeps me 
by His po'

Though all the world forsake me,
And Satan tempted me
Sure through Jesus shall safely reach the goal
He's the lily of the valley
The bright and moming star
He's the fairest of ten 
thousand to my soul
